channel.title: Server Sick on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Sick on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: once again
item.description: i feel like I have been ehre before. it is almost four o clock.. although the post will not have that time stamp.. the server’s time is a bit off.. silly rebooting.. silly non syncing time.. silly lazy sysadmin.. but anyway… we went and saw the matrix tonight. it was fun. I have decided that I will probably finsih my tattoos soon. I am scared though. cuz I know they will hurt and I hate that part about that.
